headline: ADP Downgraded to Underperform as Jefferies Flags Structural Headwinds
summary: Automatic Data Processing, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADP) is included among the 14 Best Dividend Aristocrats to Invest in Heading into 2026. On December 16, Jefferies analyst Samad Samana downgraded Automatic Data Processing, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADP) to Underperform from Hold and cut the price target to $230 from $245. The firm said it “thinks highly” of management, but described […]

headline: Reasons Why Investors Can Consider Buying ADP Stock Now
summary: Automatic Data Processing accelerates growth via DataCloud, Q1 FY26 mid-single-digit gains and 25.5% margins, plus smart deals and a 51st straight dividend hike.
